text: avar (tan viruppattirku maraka) oru pen kulantaiyaip perretuttapotu ‘‘en iraivane! Nan oru pennaiye perren'' enru kurinar. Ayinum (avar virumpiya) an, intap pennaip ponralla enpatai allah(tan) nankarivan. (Piraku imranin manaivi) niccayamaka nan atarku ‘maryam' enap peyaritten. Ataiyum, atan cantatiyaiyum virattappatta saittani(n vancanaikali)liruntu ni kapparra unnitam pirarttikkiren!'' (Enrar)
